Container.Name: lychee
Container.Overview: Lychee(https://lycheeorg.github.io/) is a free photo-management tool, which runs on your server or web-space. Installing is a matter of seconds. Upload, manage and share photos like from a native application. Lychee comes with everything you need and all your photos are stored securely.

Config.Name: Path: /pictures
Config.Description: Where lychee will store uploaded images.

Config.Name: DB_HOST
Config.Description: DB server hostname. For `mysql` and `pgsql` only.

Config.Name: DB_PORT
Config.Description: DB server port. For `mysql` and `pgsql` only.

Config.Name: DB_DATABASE
Config.Description: Path to DB file for `sqlite`. DB name for `mysql` and `pgsql`.

Config.Name: APP_URL
Config.Description: The URL you will use to access Lychee including protocol, and port where appropriate.

Config.Name: TRUSTED_PROXIES
Config.Description: Set to the IP or netmask covering your reverse proxy, if running behind one. Set to `*` to trust all IPs (**do not** use `*` if exposed to the internet`).
